numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that in each sports league more than 50 percent of the players are players of color.
2. The Major League Baseball is an exception.
3. I notice that the number of head coaches of color is very low compared to the number of players of color.
4. I wonder why the Major League Baseball differs from other sports leagues in the percentage of players of color.
5. I wonder why there is a lack of white people in sports leagues.
6. Most people in America are white.
7. This situation may imply that people of color are more talented in sports.
8. Some athletes around me are people of color.
9. These athletes may have a chance to become members of sports leagues.
10. The topic is diversity in sports.
